row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &PROTO_BEA# = 'J' :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'AZNBatch_Bearb' :SET &PROGRAMMTYP# = '480' :SET &VERTRAEGE# = 'N' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p480_&TS#.out' :SET &EXTOUTFILE1# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.fp' :SET &EXTOUTFILE2# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#.tp' ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# TERMINE = &TERMINE_IMS# VERTRAEGE = &VERTRAEGE# ANZAHL = &ANZAHL_VTR# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# BEARBEITER = &PROGRAMMTYP# OPTIONS = &OPTIONS# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# EXTOUTFILE1 = &EXTOUTFILE1# EXTOUTFILE2 = &EXTOUTFILE2# [PROTOKOLL] PROTO = &PROTO_BEA# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
